definition: properly, to lick, i.e. (by implication) to blaze
kjvTranslation: burn (up), set on fire, flaming, kindle.

translations.bg: правилно, да лиже, т.е. (по подразбиране) да пламне
translations.da: korrekt, at slikke, dvs. (underforstået) at brænde
translations.el: σωστά, να γλείφω, δηλαδή (κατ' επέκταση) να φλέγομαι
translations.id: dengan benar, menjilat, yaitu (dengan implikasi) untuk menyalakan
translations.ja: 正しくは、舐める、すなわち（暗に）燃やす
translations.nb: egentlig, å slikke, dvs. (underforstått) å brenne
translations.pt: propriamente dito, lamber, ou seja, (implicitamente) arder
translations.ro: corect, a linge, adică (implicit) a arde
